_header: This day Saint John the gospeller
Note: For other MSS see 6049; for the version in the ‘expanded’ Cycle see 5394.
_description: Gospel for Fourth Sunday in Advent, in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodAsh42.First Lines:
This daye saynte Ione þe gospellereSaise in oure gospell als
                    ȝe may here…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…I will ȝow tell of a pilgrimeHow sathanas him trayed ane
                    tyme
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

CULDd11.First Lines:
This day seyth seynt iohn þe gospellerein oure gospel as
                    ȝe may here…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…I wile ȝow tellin of a pilgrymhow sathanas begiled
                    hym

Lam260.First Lines:
TO day saynt Iohn þe gospelereSays in oure gospell as ȝe
                    may here…
Lam260.Last Lines:
…I wyll ȝow tell of a pylgrymeHow sathanas hym tryed a
                    tyme
